item.title: Error Help
item.dc:creator: @acesoldier acesoldier
item.description:
@acesoldier wrote:

Can errors interface with a game like disable commands and stuff? I have over 100 errors on my server and I have no clue how to fix that tried everything. These commands i put in game after 100 errors and they dont work but everying else does. So can errors stop things in a server from working?

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("mole")) { teleportToX = 3173; teleportToY = 9655; inwildy = false; sendMessage("Go kill those giant moles!"); }

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("dungeon")) if(absY >= 3672) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness."); } else { teleportToX = 2884; teleportToY = 9798; inwildy = false; sendMessage("Have fun! Buy some food!"); }

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("dungeongate")) { teleportToX = 2920; teleportToY = 9801; inwildy = false; sendMessage("There ya go!"); }

Read full topic
